title: The Writer's Almanac for Monday, March 28, 2022
description: "A certain ruthlessness and a sense of alienation from society is as essential to creative writing as it is to armed robbery." -- Nelson Algren, born on this day in Detroit, 1909.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "A certain ruthlessness and a sense of alienation from society is as essential to creative writing as it is to armed robbery." -- Nelson Algren, born on this day in Detroit, 1909.
